This app provides a visualization of Philadelphia crime data from 2006-2014. The data is available via [OpenDataPhilly](https://www.opendataphilly.org/dataset/philadelphia-police-part-one-crime-incidents). The points represent the number of crime occurences in each month while the line is the general trend over the course of the selected year. 

Created by Chris Tufts 2015.
